recipes.win_aws::install_dotnet_sdk: Install Amazon Web Services SDK for .NET
recipes.win_aws::do_register_instance_with_elb: Register the instance with an Elastic Load Balancer created in the same ec2 region. Requires recipe: 'win_aws::install_dotnet_sdk'
recipes.win_aws::download: Retrieves a file from an S3 bucket
recipes.win_aws::do_deregister_instance_from_elb: Deregister the instance with an Elastic Load Balancer created in the same ec2 region. Requires recipe: 'win_aws::install_dotnet_sdk'
recipes.win_aws::upload: Uploads a file to an S3 bucket

long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Amazon Web Services recipes and providers for Windows

= REQUIREMENTS:


= ATTRIBUTES: 

See metadata.rb

= USAGE:

Designed to be run within a RightScale ServerTemplate

Examples for the providers:

# download a a file from S3 using the :get provider

  win_aws_s3 "downloadmyfile" do
    access_key_id @node[:aws][:access_key_id]
    secret_access_key @node[:aws][:secret_access_key]
    s3_bucket "my-eu-bucket"
    s3_file "myfile.txt"
    download_dir 'c:'
    action :get
  end

# register instance with elb

  win_aws_elb "register instance provider call" do
    access_key_id @node[:aws][:access_key_id]
    secret_access_key @node[:aws][:secret_access_key]
    elb_name "production-elb"
    action :register
  end
description: Amazon Web Services recipes and providers for Windows
name: win_aws
license:
Copyright (c) 2010 RightScale, Inc.

All rights reserved

s3/bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket

win_aws/download_dir.description: The directory where the file from s3 will be downloaded. Ex: c:\tmp\

s3/file.description: File to be retrieved from the s3 bucket. Ex: app.zip

aws/access_key_id.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve you access identifiers. Ex: 1JHQQ4KVEVM02KVEVM02

aws/elb_name.description: The name of the Elastic Load Balancer to register/deregister the instance with. (e.g., production-elb). The ELB needs to be created and configured prior to the execution of the recipe.

aws/secret_access_key.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve your access identifiers. Ex: XVdxPgOM4auGcMlPz61IZGotpr9LzzI07tT8s2Ws

win_aws/file_path.description: The full path to the file to be uploaded. Ex: c:\tmp\my.txt
